name: real_time_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bart.
Tool description: The BART API gives you access to pretty much all of the BART service and station data available on the BART website.
API description: Fetches real-time information from the BART API based on the provided command and origin station.

cmd.description: Command parameter for the API request. Examples can be found at http://api.bart.gov/docs/overview/examples.aspx.

orig.description: Specifies the station. Stations are referenced by their abbreviations (http://api.bart.gov/docs/overview/abbrev.aspx). You can also use 'ALL' to get all of the current ETD's.
